meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by eugenics.
meanings.sent1: The eugenical study focused on improving genetic traits in a population.
meanings.sent2: Her eugenical beliefs led her to support selective breeding for desirable traits.
meanings.sent3: The eugenical experiment aimed to create the perfect garden gnome.
meanings.sent4: His eugenical approach to gardening involved carefully selecting the strongest plants.
meanings.sent5: The eugenical process aimed to enhance the overall quality of the species.

meanings.sent1: The eugenical organization held seminars to spread their beliefs on genetic improvement.
meanings.sent2: His eugenical speeches often sparked controversy due to their controversial nature.
meanings.sent3: The eugenical club hosted a bake sale to fund their genetic research.
meanings.sent4: Her eugenical campaign aimed to educate the public on the benefits of selective breeding.
meanings.sent5: The eugenical movement gained momentum as more people became interested in genetic enhancement.
